Token.Abstract: Returns a Array with beacons filtered on the given proximity.

Parameter.Name: beacons
Parameter.Abstract: An array of beacons to filter

Parameter.Name: proximity
Parameter.Abstract: The proximity a beacon has to be in

Parameter.Name: closest
Parameter.Abstract: A boolean indicating if only the closest beacon should be returend. If NO all beacons mathing the filter criteria are returned. If YES of all the beacons mathing the filter criteria only the closest of them all is returned. The beacons accucary is used to determine the closest beacon.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Array of beacons that match the filter criteria.

Token.Abstract: Returns a Array with beacons filtered on the given proximity and accuracy.

Parameter.Name: beacons
Parameter.Abstract: An array of beacons to filter

Parameter.Name: proximity
Parameter.Abstract: The proximity a beacon has to be in

Parameter.Name: accuracy
Parameter.Abstract: The accuracy of the beacon proximity from the mobile device

Parameter.Name: closest
Parameter.Abstract: A boolean indicating if only the closest beacon should be returend. If NO all beacons mathing the filter criteria are returned. If YES of all the beacons mathing the filter criteria only the closest of them all is returned. The beacons accucary is used to determine the closest beacon.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Array of beacons that match the filter criteria.

Parameter.Abstract: A boolean indicating if only the closest beacon should be returend. If NO all beacons mathing the filter criteria are returned. If YES of all the beacons mathing the filter criteria only the closest of them all is returned. The beacons accucary is used to determine the closest beacon.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Array of beacons that match the filter criteria.
